Title: Wake Island
Cast: Brian Donlevy, Macdonald Carey, Robert Preston, William Bendix, Albert Dekker, Walter Abel, Mikhail Rasumny, Rod Cameron, Bill Goodwin, Damian O'Flynn, Frank Albertson
Plot: December, 1941. With no hope of relief or re-supply, a small band of United States Marines try to keep the Japanese Navy from capturing their island base. In November 1941, Major Caton takes command of the small Marine garrison on Wake Island. His tendency toward spit and polish upsets the men's tropical lassitude, but Pearl Harbor changes everything. Soon the island is attacked and the Marines pull together day by day; but how long can they hold out? Written by Rod Crawford <puffinus@u.washington.edu>
Keywords: marines, golden gate bridge, buddy movie, war violence, machine gun
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
Actors: Brian Donlevy, Robert Preston, Macdonald Carey
